game.title: Daily Challenge
game.comeTomorrow: Come back tomorrow to complete tomorrow's challenge!

auth.guestMessage: Your progress is saved locally. Sign in to save across devices and compete on the leaderboard!

nickname.description: Before you start, let us know what we should call you
nickname.betterWithAccount: ðŸ’¡ Better with an account! Sign in to save your progress across devices and keep your ranking.

errors.tooShort: Nickname must be at least 2 characters
errors.tooLong: Nickname must be less than 20 characters
errors.taken: This nickname is already taken. Please choose another one.

errors.tooLong: Word must be 30 characters or less

auth.pleaseSignIn: Sign in to save your progress and compete!
auth.guestMessage: Your progress is saved locally. Sign in to save across devices and compete on the leaderboard!

leaderboard.title: Leaderboard
leaderboard.noEntries: No entries yet. Be the first to play!
leaderboard.scoringExplanation: The score is based on how many attempts you used and how close you got. Fewer attempts and higher proximity = better score. Players who solve the challenge get priority!
leaderboard.globalExplanation: This ranking shows the players who have accumulated the most points over time. Points are earned from your performance in each daily challenge: better proximity and fewer attempts = more points!

howToPlay.title: How to Play
howToPlay.rule1: You have 12 attempts to guess the word of the day
howToPlay.rule2: Each guess will show you how similar your word is to the target word
howToPlay.rule3: The closer your guess, the 'hotter' the feedback will be
howToPlay.rule4: Use word proximity to narrow down your guesses
howToPlay.rule5: A new word is available every day at midnight
howToPlay.tipText: The proximity score is based on word meanings, not spelling. Words with similar meanings will score higher even if they're spelled differently!

share.title: Share 12Tries!
share.description: Challenge your friends to guess the word of the day!

suggestion.title: Congratulations! ðŸŽ‰
suggestion.message: Enjoyed the game? Share it with your friends!

semanticExplanation.slide5Text: Use the % proximity to find related words. The higher, the closer you are!

rocky.title: Hey! Don't Give Up!
rocky.message: I'm Rocky, your lucky mascot! I can give you ONE more attempt. What do you say?

reminders.dialogDescription: We'll send you an email when a new challenge is available. You can unsubscribe at any time.
reminders.privacyNotice: Your information is protected and will not be used for any other purpose.
reminders.successMessage: Subscribed successfully! We'll remind you when the next challenge is ready.
reminders.errorMessage: Something went wrong. Please try again.
reminders.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
reminders.mustAcceptTerms: You must accept the terms and conditions

unsubscribed.title: Successfully Unsubscribed
unsubscribed.message: You've been unsubscribed from challenge reminders.
unsubscribed.comeback: We're sad to see you go, but you can always come back and play whenever you want!

cookies.message: We use cookies to improve your experience and analyze site traffic. By clicking 'Accept', you consent to our use of cookies.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using 12Tries, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use our service.

section2.title: 2. Use of Service
section2.content: 12Tries provides a daily word guessing game. You agree to use the service only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of others.

section3.title: 3. User Accounts
section3.content: You may play as a guest or create an account using Google authentication. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account information.

section4.title: 4. Email Reminders
section4.content: By subscribing to email reminders, you consent to receive notifications when new challenges are available. You can unsubscribe at any time through the link provided in each email.

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
section5.content: All content, features, and functionality of 12Tries are owned by us and are protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws.

section6.title: 6. Limitation of Liability
section6.content: 12Tries is provided 'as is' without any warranties. We shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use or inability to use our service.

section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
section1.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including when you create an account, subscribe to reminders, or use our services.

section2.title: 2. Types of Information
section2.content: We may collect the following information:
section2.item1: Email address (when you subscribe to reminders or sign in with Google)
section2.item4: IP address (for security and rate limiting purposes)
section2.item5: Usage data and analytics through cookies (if consented)

section3.title: 3. Cookies and Analytics
section3.content: We use Google Analytics to understand how visitors interact with our website. This service uses cookies to collect information such as page visits, time spent on site, and user interactions. You can control cookie preferences through our cookie consent banner. By accepting cookies, you consent to the collection of this data. Google Analytics data is anonymized and used solely for improving our service.

section4.title: 4. How We Use Your Information
section4.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to send you email reminders (if subscribed), to analyze usage patterns and improve user experience, and to protect against abuse.

section5.title: 5. Information Sharing
section5.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties. Your email will only be used to send challenge reminders if you have subscribed. Analytics data collected by Google Analytics is subject to Google's Privacy Policy.

section6.title: 6. Data Security
section6.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information and ensure it remains confidential at all times.

section7.title: 7. Your Rights
section7.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information at any time. You can unsubscribe from email reminders by clicking the unsubscribe link in any reminder email. You can also withdraw your cookie consent at any time by clearing your browser cookies.

embedInfo.title: Embed This Game On Your Website
embedInfo.subtitle: Add the daily word guessing challenge to your site with a simple iframe
embedInfo.feature1Text: Just copy and paste one line of HTML code
embedInfo.feature2Text: Includes game play and top 5 leaderboard
embedInfo.feature3Text: Players just pick a nickname and play
embedInfo.embedCodeDesc: Copy this code and paste it into your HTML
embedInfo.noteText: The embed version is responsive and works on all devices. Recommended minimum width: 320px. For best experience use 768px+ width.

metadata.title: 12Tries - Daily Word Challenge Game | Guess the Word with AI
metadata.description: Test your vocabulary with daily word challenges! Use AI-powered semantic similarity to guess words in 12 tries. Play daily word puzzles, compete on the leaderboard, and challenge your friends in this free online word game.
metadata.keywords: word game, daily word challenge, guess the word, vocabulary game, semantic similarity, AI word game, word puzzle, daily puzzle, word guessing game, 12tries, online word game, free word game
metadata.ogDescription: Test your vocabulary with daily word challenges! Use AI-powered semantic similarity to guess words in 12 tries. Play now and compete with friends!
metadata.twitterDescription: Test your vocabulary with daily word challenges! Use AI-powered semantic similarity to guess words in 12 tries.

embed.noPlayers: No one has played today yet. Be the first!
